Text.Name: GlobalEfficiency
Text.Desc: The cultivators' basic work rate, which affects all work they do.

Text.Name: SmithingInjuredChance
Text.Desc: The chance for harmful accidents to occur while carrying out forging work.

Text.Name: MiningInjuredChance
Text.Desc: The chance for harmful accidents to occur while carrying out digging work.

Text.Name: ConstructInjuredChance
Text.Desc: The chance for harmful accidents to occur while carrying out building work.

Text.Name: DrugProductSpeed
Text.Desc: The work rate associated with making medicine, affected by mood.

Text.Name: TreatSpeed
Text.Desc: The work rate associated with healing, affected by mood.

Text.Name: TreatSuccessChance
Text.Desc: The probability for healing to be carried out successfully. Failure can lead to the injury worsening.

Text.Name: TreatmentExpectQuality
Text.Desc: The estimated value for how long an injury will take to recover following treatment. Can vary somewhat according to the doctor's status.

Text.Name: TreatmentRealQualityPercentMin
Text.Desc: The lowest random value that can be attained when carrying out healing.

Text.Name: TreatmentRealQualityPercentMax
Text.Desc: The highest random value that can be attained while carrying out healing.

Text.Name: CookingSpeed
Text.Desc: The work rate associated with cooking, affected by mood.

Text.Name: ButcherSpeed
Text.Desc: The work rate associated with butchering, affected by mood.

Text.Name: ButcherYieldEfficiency
Text.Desc: The ratio of fur and meat yielded from butchering.

Text.Name: CookingSuccessChance
Text.Desc: The success rate for preparing food. Failure can result in a spoiled meal.

Text.Name: StoneWorkSpeed
Text.Desc: The work rate associated with processing and polishing stone materials, affected by mood.

Text.Name: ConstructionSpeed
Text.Desc: The work rate associated with construction, affected by mood.

Text.Name: ConstructSuccessChance
Text.Desc: The success rate for building structures. Failure can lead to injury.

Text.Name: PlantWorkSpeed
Text.Desc: The work rate associated with farming, affected by mood.

Text.Name: PlantHarvestSpeed
Text.Desc: The work rate associated with harvesting, affected by mood.

Text.Name: PlantHarvestYieldEfficiency
Text.Desc: The crop yield gained from harvesting crops.

Text.Name: MiningSpeed
Text.Desc: The work rate associated with mining, affected by mood.

Text.Name: MiningYieldEfficiency
Text.Desc: The yield gained from mining for minerals.

Text.Name: MadeQualityAddValue
Text.Desc: The quality that is added to items when crafting them into end products.

Text.Name: ArtRateValue
Text.Desc: The quality that is added to items when crafting them into end products.

Text.Name: SmithingSpeed
Text.Desc: The work rate associated with forging, affected by mood.

Text.Name: HandworkSpeed
Text.Desc: The work rate associated with handicraft, affected by mood.

Text.Name: TailoringSpeed
Text.Desc: The work rate associated with sewing, affected by mood.

Text.Name: ManufactureExpectQuality
Text.Desc: The estimated quality of a product being crafted. The end product's value will be within a margin around this estimate.

Text.Name: ManufactureRealQualityPercentMin
Text.Desc: The lowest possible quality of an item being crafted.

Text.Name: ManufactureRealQualityPercentMax
Text.Desc: The highest possible quality of an item being crafted.

Text.Name: SmithingQualityAddValue
Text.Desc: The quality that is added to the finished items when forging.

Text.Name: HandworkQualityAddValue
Text.Desc: The quality that is added to the finished items when doing handicraft.

Text.Name: TailoringQualityAddValue
Text.Desc: The quality that is added to the finished items when sewing.

Text.Name: CuttingSpeed
Text.Desc: The work rate associated with woodcutting, cutting grass and so on, affected by mood.

Text.Name: DisasterFightingSpeed
Text.Desc: The work rate associated with firefighting behaviors, affected by mood.

Text.Name: DisasterFightingSuccessChance
Text.Desc: The chance for success when engaging in firefighting maneuvers. Failure can result in injuries.

Text.Name: CleanSpeed
Text.Desc: The work rate associated with cleaning, affected by mood.

Text.Name: SocialInclination
Text.Desc: The tendency to have different kinds of social behaviors, affected by mood.
